law.catch_line: Deposits in water without permit prohibited.
law.text: No person, city, county, or other political subdivision of the state shall deposit or cause to be deposited any matter that will in any way restrict or disturb the flow of water in the channel or in the floodway of any stream except where a permit has been issued for construction under KRS 151.250, or to encroach on the reservoir area of any dam authorized by the Congress of the United States, or under the jurisdiction of the Commonwealth, or any of its political subdivisions.
